definitions.definition: A flexible sleeve made of latex or other impermeable material such as polyurethane or sheepskin , worn over an erect penis during sexual intercourse as a contraceptive or as a way to prevent the spread of STIs during PIV , anal , or oral .

Any flexible sleeve or barrier made of latex or other impermeable material such as polyurethane or sheepskin , worn during sexual activity to prevent pregnancy or the spread of STIs ; for example, an internal condom .

main_definition: A flexible sleeve made of latex or other impermeable material such as polyurethane or sheepskin , worn over an erect penis during sexual intercourse as a contraceptive or as a way to prevent the spread of STIs during PIV , anal , or oral .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) Any flexible sleeve or barrier made of latex or other impermeable material such as polyurethane or sheepskin , worn during sexual activity to prevent pregnancy or the spread of STIs ; for example, an internal condom .
